divs: sighting detailsi was on the front lawn drinking a coffee and looking at the sky behind my roof, spotting an unusually large golden\amberish star that was stationary, like the rest of the stars. suddenly it began moving, from its east position toward north. it moved slowly, without any noise or any blinking lights. i think it was climbing in altitude because its size began matching the rest of the stars. it moved northernly for about ten seconds or less, whereof it stopped, now hovering stationary once again. i watched it for a few more minutes but it wasn't moving. then i went inside to get rid of the coffee cup. when i returned outside, the star was gone.
Summary: a large golden star moves across sky and then remains hovering higher up
